titleStmt.title: A discourse of a discouerie for a new passage to Cataia. VVritten by Sir Humfrey Gilbert, Knight
titleStmt.author: Gilbert, Humphrey, Sir, 1539?-1583.
Gascoigne, George, 1542?-1577.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Henry Middleton for Richarde Ihones,

notesStmt.note: With a final errata and colophon leaf.
Running title reads: A newe passage to Cataia.
The woodcut map is captioned: A general map, made onelye for the particuler declaration of this discouery.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
